website_summaries.verdict: If you watch a lot of Blu-rays and DVDs from foreign countries, a region-free player is an absolute must.
pros: It can play DVDs from any region, and it supports lossless audio formats like DTS-HD-MA
cons: Some users complain of slow loading times

customer_reviews.title: very good performance, BluRay discs look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought in order to watch British Region B BluRay discs. Planned to sell afterwards but now I think I'll keep it. Very compact, very good performance, BluRay discs look great. You switch regions by hitting the 1-2-or 3 buttons on the remote when the disc tray is open. It comes with a sheet in the box to tell you how to do this. Seller contacted me later for feedback and asked if had received that same sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not for streaming
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst player I have ever purchased. Play DVDs fine, its worthless for streaming Netflix. Software is updated, and it constantly hangs, hangs, hangs. Constantly unplugging it to reset it as the device completely freezes up. Has gone from bad to worse, to useless and now I have to replace it with another brand of course.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 10 months since I bought this in May of 2017 and the draw will not open. No matter what I try, eject will not work so I can no longer use the product. That’s way to short a time to break down, even for an electronic device. I believe there is a one year warranty so I will be contacting the seller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This one was perfect. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is the second region free Blu-ray I got. The first one, from a different vendor, didn't work at all, there were no intelligible instructions and I couldn't get the seller to service it. This one was perfect. Fast delivery, worked perfectly out of the box, instructions were clear. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Super glitchy,  buy something else

However, it's not really working with my Netflix or Prime either. It will randomly freeze, kick me out mid program, log out of my wifi connection and sometimes it won't even turn off so I have to unplug it. The remote is cheap feeling and isn't responsive half the time. I should have just bought a fire stick or something similar and kept my old non wifi blu ray

Update 1/27/2019 using product for about a month now and the device continues to losing the Wi-Fi configuration requiring us to configure the network settings every time we want to use it for premium online content access. Very disappointing! And why I have lowered my previous 5 star rating to 3 stars!

customer_reviews.title: Nice DVD Player...
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked this up. Setup was simple and it plays DVDs that me old player could not. Video quality is great. Only negative is that it did not have an optical digital audio out port - not really a deal breaker but would have made my install easier since my audio system and my old DVD player used optical digital audio connections. The WiFi and streaming apps work perfectly. I'd recommend this unit.
